summary: Pinocchio and his friends, a glow worm and a marionette, search for a magic music box. However, so is the evil Scalawag and the Emperor of the Night.
cast: Edward Asner|Tom Bosley|Lana Beeson|Linda Gary|Jonathan Harris|James Earl Jones|Rickie Lee Jones|Don Knotts|Frank Welker|William Windom|Scott Grimes|Pat Musick|Kath Soucie
keywords: cult film|pinocchio|foreign language adaptation|based on novel|independent film
title: Pinocho y el emperador de la noche
